processing.text: if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'BankAccount', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @r int select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue; select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell đã có hoặc lồng nhau.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is invalid or already exists.' end create index i on @@table (ma_dvcs, tk) -- Update update @@table set ten_nh = case when a.ten_nh <> '' then a.ten_nh else b.ten_nh end, ten_nh2 = case when a.ten_nh2 <> '' then a.ten_nh2 else b.ten_nh2 end, tinh_thanh = case when a.tinh_thanh <> '' then a.tinh_thanh else b.tinh_thanh end, phone = case when a.phone <> '' then a.phone else b.dien_thoai end, fax = case when a.fax <> '' then a.fax else b.fax end from @@table a left join dmnh b on a.ma_nh = b.ma_nh -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join dmtknh b on a.tk = b.tk and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or b.ma_dvcs = '') -- Checking &Checking; if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'tknh', stt, @message from @@table where tknh like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'tknh', @r = min(stt) from @@table where tknh like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join dmtknh b on a.tk = b.tk and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or b.ma_dvcs = '') delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.tk = b.tk and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or a.ma_dvcs = '')) -- Checking if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, b.stt, ''00003'' from dmtknh a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.tk = rtrim(b.tk) and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or a.ma_dvcs = '''') &w1;@field, ''@@primaryKeyList''&w2;b.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by b.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = b.stt from dmtknh a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.tk = rtrim(b.tk) and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or a.ma_dvcs = '''')' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end &EndErrorMode; -- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin &Updating; end
